name: Sales Order Monthly Summary
query:
SELECT customer,order_type, SUM(qty) AS total_qty,

sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "01" THEN qty END) "01",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "02" THEN qty END) "02",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "03" THEN qty END) "03",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "04" THEN qty END) "04",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "05" THEN qty END) "05",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "06" THEN qty END) "06",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "07" THEN qty END) "07",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "08" THEN qty END) "08",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "09" THEN qty END) "09",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "10" THEN qty END) "10",

sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "11" THEN qty END) "11",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "12" THEN qty END) "12",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "13" THEN qty END) "13",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "14" THEN qty END) "14",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "15" THEN qty END) "15",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "16" THEN qty END) "16",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "17" THEN qty END) "17",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "18" THEN qty END) "18",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "19" THEN qty END) "19",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "20" THEN qty END) "20",

sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "21" THEN qty END) "21",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "22" THEN qty END) "22",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "23" THEN qty END) "23",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "24" THEN qty END) "24",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "25" THEN qty END) "25",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "26" THEN qty END) "26",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "27" THEN qty END) "27",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "28" THEN qty END) "28",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "29" THEN qty END) "29",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "30" THEN qty END) "30",
sum(CASE WHEN delivery_day = "31" THEN qty END) "31"


FROM view_sales_order_summary

WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
GROUP by customer,order_type 
ORDER BY  customer,order_type DESC, delivery_date
